AI Description: WebKitGTK+ is an open-source web browser engine. It is a GTK+ port of the WebKit engine. It offers a framework for rendering web content in applications built with GTK+.
Core Features: Rendering Web Content In Gtk+ Applications, Support For Modern Web Standards, High Performance & Efficiency, Integration With Gtk+ Applications
General Tags: Web Browser Engine, Gtk+ Port, Open-Source, Web Content Rendering
